phrase-level-annotations.speaker: other_pro
phrase-level-annotations.txt: "prohibited from indiscriminately sifting through the telephony metadata acquired under the program.”

phrase-level-annotations.speaker: internet_companies
phrase-level-annotations.txt: "From time to time, people allege that we have created a government 'back door' into our systems, but Google does not have a 'back door' for the government to access private user data."

phrase-level-annotations.speaker: internet_companies
phrase-level-annotations.txt: "If the government has a broader voluntary national security program to gather customer data we don't participate in it."

phrase-level-annotations.speaker: internet_companies
phrase-level-annotations.txt: "We disclose user data to government in accordance with the law, and we review all such requests carefully,"
